Meets: 4th Wednesday of the month at 6 p.m. via Zoom
Text: We come together each month to build the skills we need on our leadership journeys.

Meets: 4th Tuesday of the month at 12 p.m. via Zoom
Text: Together we focus on personal, professional, and political development.

Meets: 2nd Tuesday of the month at 6 p.m. via Zoom
Text: We support one another through life’s challenges, push ourselves to meet our goals, and expand our reach.

Meets: 3rd Wednesday of the month at 6:30 p.m. via Zoom
Text: A safe space to share, support, and build skills to empower women and increase equity in all areas of engagement. We're passionate about deepening personal, group, and public education.\
Our new Circle is still setting its direction!

Meets: 4th Monday of the month at 6 p.m. via Zoom
Text: Our Circle's goals are to connect and network with more women, learn more about communication across lines - political, race, generation, and making a difference through community engagement.

Meets: 1st Thursday of the month at 5:30 p.m. via Zoom
Text: We learn strategies for finding mentors, making the most out of your mentor relationship, building a strong professional network, and leadership development.

Circle Name: SC WIL Buquilla's Pee Dee Circle
